mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO seller (seller_id, member_id, representative_name, business_number,brand_name,seller_name, tel, email, password,presentation, reg_date) VALUES (SEQ_SELLER.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{representativeName}, #{businessNumber}, #{brandName}, #{sellerName}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{password},#{presentation}, SYSDATE) INTO seller_status (seller_id, status) VALUES (SEQ_SELLER.CURRVAL, 0) SELECT * FROM dual
UPDATE seller_status SET status = #{status} WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId}
